subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: Ron Washington, the manager of the Texas Rangers, readily defers to Tony La Russa’s acumen, but he didn’t need to match wits with the Cardinals’ manager for Monday night’s victory.
snippet: Ron Washington, the manager of the Texas Rangers, readily defers to Tony La Russa’s acumen, but he didn’t need to match wits with the Cardinals’ manager for Monday night’s victory.
